author: pipermerriam
content:
Something like taking the last million mainnet txns and comparing time to:

- encode / decode (rlp vs ssz)
- hash (keccak vs ssz)
- extract parameters needed for signature verification

And for context, probably good to compare these to the time it takes to verify the transaction signature for a sense of scale.
